00050 DmetEngine * DmetEngine::FromBase(BaseEngine *engine)
00051 {
00052         if (engine != NULL && engine->getEngineName() == DmetEngine::EngineName())
00053                 return (DmetEngine *)engine;
00054         return NULL;
00055 }

00057 /**
00058  * Constructor
00059  */
00060 DmetEngine::DmetEngine() {
00061     defineOptions();
00062 
00063     //
00064     m_ArgvPosAPS = -1;
00065     m_ArgvPosCN = -1;
00066     m_ArgvPosAPG = -1;
00067 }
00068 
00069 int DmetEngine::parseArgv( const char * const * const argv, int start ){
00070     vector<string> argvStrings;
00071     for (const char* const * arg=argv;*arg!=NULL;arg++) {
00072         argvStrings.push_back(*arg);
00073     }
00074     int argc = argvStrings.size();
00075 
00076     // Parse DmetEngine Options
00077     int argvPos = Options::parseArgv(argv, start);
00078 
00079     vector<string> celFiles;
00080     for(vector<const char *>::size_type i = 0; i < getArgCount(); i++)
00081         celFiles.push_back(getArg(i));
00082     setOpt("cels",celFiles);
00083 
00084     // Allow user to override APS defaults
00085     if(argc > argvPos) {
00086         ProbesetSummarizeEngine pse;
00087         int newArgvPos = pse.parseArgv(argv, argvPos+1);
00088         Verbose::out(1,"Parsed " + ToStr(newArgvPos - argvPos - 1) + " extra options for ProbesetSummarizeEngine!");
00089         m_ArgvPosAPS = argvPos + 1;
00090         argvPos = newArgvPos;
00091     } else {
00092         m_ArgvPosAPS = -1;
00093     }
00094 
00095     // Allow user to override CN defaults
00096     if(argc > argvPos) {
00097         DmetCopyNumberEngine cde;
00098         int newArgvPos = cde.parseArgv(argv,argvPos+1);
00099         Verbose::out(1,"Parsed " + ToStr(newArgvPos - argvPos - 1) + " extra options for DmetCopyNumberEngine!");
00100         m_ArgvPosCN = argvPos + 1;
00101         argvPos = newArgvPos;
00102     } else {
00103         m_ArgvPosCN = -1;
00104     }
00105     
00106     // Allow user to override APG defaults
00107     if(argc > argvPos) {
00108         ProbesetGenotypeEngine pge;
00109         int newArgvPos = pge.parseArgv(argv,argvPos+1);
00110         Verbose::out(1,"Parsed " + ToStr(newArgvPos - argvPos - 1) + " extra options for ProbesetGenotypeEngine!");
00111         m_ArgvPosAPG = argvPos + 1;
00112         argvPos = newArgvPos;
00113     } else {
00114         m_ArgvPosAPG = -1;
00115     }
00116 
00117     m_argv = argv;
00118     return argvPos;
00119 }

00127 void DmetEngine::defineOptions() {
00128 
00129     defineOptionSection("Input Options");
00130         defineOption("", "cel-files", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00131                      "Text file specifying cel files to process, one per line with the first line being 'cel_files'.",
00132                      "");
00133         defineOption("c", "cdf-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00134                      "File defining probe sets. Use either --cdf-file or --spf-file. ",
00135                      "");
00136         defineOption("", "spf-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00137                      "File defining probe sets in spf (simple probe format) which is like a text cdf file.",
00138                      "");
00139         defineOption("", "special-snps",PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00140                     "File containing all snps of unusual copy (chrX,mito,Y)",
00141                     "");
00142         defineOption("", "chrX-probes", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00143                      "File containing probe_id (1-based) of probes on chrX. "
00144                      "Used for copy number probe chrX/Y ratio gender calling. ",
00145                      "");
00146         defineOption("", "chrY-probes", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00147                      "File containing probe_id (1-based) of probes on chrY. "
00148                      "Used for copy number probe chrX/Y ratio gender calling. ",
00149                      "");
00150         defineOption("", "reference-input", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00151                      "Reference file with cluster prior information. ",
00152                      "");
00153         defineOption("s", "probeset-ids", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00154                      "Tab delimited file with column 'probeset_id' specifying probesets to analyze.",
00155                      "");
00156         defineOption("", "probeset-ids-reported", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00157                      "Tab delimited file with column 'probeset_id' specifying probesets to report. "
00158                      "This should be a subset of those specified with --probeset-ids if that option is used.",
00159                      "");
00160         defOptMult("", "chip-type", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00161                      "Chip types to check library and CEL files against. "
00162                      "Can be specified multiple times. "
00163                      "The first one is propigated as the chip type in the output files. "
00164                      "Warning, use of this option will override the usual check between chip types "
00165                      "found in the library files and cel files. You should use this option instead "
00166                      "of --force when possible. ",
00167                      "");
00168         defineOption("", "region-model", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00169                      "Regions model parameters. ",
00170                      "");
00171         defineOption("", "probeset-model", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00172                      "Probeset model parameters. ",
00173                      "");
00174         defineOption("", "cn-region-gt-probeset-file", 
00175                                PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00176                                "Tab delimited file mapping probeset ids to copynumber regions. ",
00177                                "");
00178 
00179     defineOptionSection("Output Options");
00180         defineOption("", "cc-chp-output", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00181                     "Output resulting calls in directory called 'chp' under out-dir. "
00182                     "This makes one AGCC Multi Data CHP file per cel file analyzed.",
00183                     "false");
00184         defineOption("", "reference-output", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00185                      "File to write reference values to. Specifying this option will turn on "
00186                      "dynamic clustering. WARNING: Currently the "
00187                      "resulting reference file is not really usable as a reference. "
00188                      "See the manual for more info. ",
00189                      "");
00190         defineOption("", "batch-name", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00191                      "The name of the batch for the dynamic cluster analysis. ",
00192                      "");
00193 
00194     defineOptionSection("Analysis Options");
00195         defineOption("", "set-analysis-name", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00196                   "Explicitly set the analysis name. This affects output file names (ie prefix) and various meta info.",
00197                     "dmet");
00198         defineOption("", "ps-analysis", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00199                   "Explicitly set the ProbesetSummarizeEngine analysis string.",
00200                   "");
00201         defineOption("", "gt-analysis", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00202                   "Explicitly set the ProbesetGenotypeEngine analysis string.",
00203                   "");
00204         defineOption("", "gt-qmethod-spec", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00205                   "Explicitly set the ProbesetGenotypeEngine quant spec.",
00206                   "");
00207         defineOption("", "sample-type", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00208                     "Set the type of samples being processed. eg genomic, plasmid.",
00209                     "unknown");
00210         defineOption("", "batch-info", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00211                     "Indicates whether or not information about other cel files in the batch "
00212                     "should be reported in CHP headers.",
00213                     "false");
00214         defineOption("", "null-context", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00215                     "Indicates whether or not context info should be populated in the CHP files.",

00218                   "Indicates if the CN engine should be run or not.",

00220         defineOption("", "pra-thresh", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00221                   "The threshold for calling PRAs based on the cluster mean strength.",
00222                   "3");
00223         defineOption("", "geno-call-thresh", PgOpt::DOUBLE_OPT,
00224                   "The confidence threshold for reporting calls in the CHP file.",
00225                   "0.1");
00226 
00227     defineOptionSection("Gender Options");
00228 
00229         defineOption("", "female-thresh", PgOpt::DOUBLE_OPT,
00230                     "Threshold for calling females when using cn-probe-chrXY-ratio method.",
00231                     "0.17");
00232         defineOption("", "male-thresh", PgOpt::DOUBLE_OPT,
00233                     "Threshold for calling females when using cn-probe-chrXY-ratio method.",
00234                     "0.68");

00237         defineOption("", "call-coder-max-alleles", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00238                     "For encoding/decoding calls, the max number of alleles per marker to allow.",
00239                     "6");

00241                     "The data size used to encode the call.",
00242                     "UCHAR");

00244                     "The version of the encoder/decoder to use",
00245                     "1.0");

00248         defineOption("", "use-disk", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00249                      "Store CEL intensities to be analyzed on disk.", "true");
00250         defineOption("", "disk-cache", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00251                      "Size of intensity memory cache in millions of intensities (when --use-disk=true).",
00252                      "50");
00253 
00254     defineOptionSection("Engine Options (Not used on command line)");
00255         defOptMult("", "cels", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00256                      "Cel files to process.",
00257                      "");
00258         defOptMult("", "report", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00259                      "Probesets to report. eg consented.",
00260                      "");

00263 void DmetEngine::defineStates() {
00264     defineOption("", "num-rows", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00265                          "The number of rows on the chip.",
00266                          "-1");
00267     defineOption("", "num-cols", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00268                          "The number of cols on the chip.",
00269                          "-1");
00270     defineOption("", "probe-count", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00271                          "The number of probes on the chip.",
00272                          "-1");
00273 }
00274 
00275 /**
00276  * Make sure that our options are sane. Call Err::errAbort if not.
00277  */
00278 void DmetEngine::checkOptionsImp() {
00279 
00280     defineStates();
00281 
00282     setLibFileOpt("cdf-file");
00283     setLibFileOpt("spf-file");
00284     setLibFileOpt("special-snps");
00285     setLibFileOpt("chrX-probes");
00286     setLibFileOpt("chrY-probes");
00287     setLibFileOpt("reference-input");
00288     setLibFileOpt("probeset-ids");
00289     setLibFileOpt("probeset-ids-reported");
00290     setLibFileOpt("region-model");
00291     setLibFileOpt("probeset-model");
00292         setLibFileOpt("cn-region-gt-probeset-file");
00293 
00294     if (getOpt("out-dir") == "") {Err::errAbort("Must specify an output directory.");}
00295     if (getOpt("temp-dir") == "") { 
00296       setOpt("temp-dir", Fs::join(getOpt("out-dir"),"temp"));
00297     }
00298 
00299     string cdfFile = getOpt("cdf-file");
00300     string spfFile = getOpt("spf-file");
00301     string specialSnps = getOpt("special-snps");
00302     string chrXProbes = getOpt("chrX-probes");
00303     string chrYProbes = getOpt("chrY-probes");
00304 
00305         if(getOpt("sample-type") == "plasmid") { 
00306                 setOpt("run-cn-engine","false"); 
00307         } else { 
00308                 setOpt("run-cn-engine",getOpt("run-cn-engine"));
00309         }
00310 
00311     string refOut = getOpt("reference-output");
00312         string batchName = getOpt("batch-name");
00313     if(refOut == "") {
00314                 if (batchName.empty() != true)
00315                         Err::errAbort("You cannot provide a batch-name when running in single sample mode. batch-name is only valid when output-reference is specified.");
00316     } else {
00317                 if (batchName.empty() == true)
00318                         Err::errAbort("You must define the batch-name parameter");
00319         if(Fs::isReadable(refOut))
00320             if(Fs::rm(refOut, false) != APT_OK)
00321                 Err::errAbort("Unable to remove existing reference-output file '" + refOut + "'");
00322         }
00323 
00324     ///@todo check chip type in reference file
00325     ///@todo check reference file version
00326 
00327     /* Read in cel file list from other file if specified. */
00328     vector<string> celFiles;
00329     EngineUtil::getCelFiles(celFiles, this);
00330     if(celFiles.size() == 0)
00331         Err::errAbort("No cel files specified.");
00332     setOpt("cels",celFiles);
00333 
00334     // Build a consent file if vector of markers was passed in
00335     vector<string> consented = getOptVector("report");
00336     if(consented.size() > 0) {
00337       FsPath probeset_path;
00338       probeset_path.setPath(getOpt("out-dir"),"probesets-reported","txt");
00339       //probeset_path.ensureWriteableDirPath();
00340           Fs::ensureWriteableDirPath(getOpt("out-dir", false));
00341       writeProbesetList(probeset_path.asUnixPath(), consented);
00342       setOpt("probeset-ids-reported", probeset_path.asUnixPath());
00343     } else {
00344       setOpt("probeset-ids-reported", getOpt("probeset-ids-reported"));
00345     }
00346 
00347     if(cdfFile == "" && spfFile == "")
00348         Err::errAbort("Must specify either a cdf file or spf (simple probe format) file.");
00349     if (chrXProbes != "" && chrYProbes == "")
00350         Err::errAbort("Must provide a chrY Probe File when providing a chrX Probe File.");
00351     if (chrXProbes == "" && chrYProbes != "")
00352         Err::errAbort("Must provide a chrX Probe File when providing a chrY Probe File.");
00353 
00354     // Check chip types
00355     vector<string> chipTypesInLayout;
00356 
00357     /* Get the intial info about the chip and check cel files to make sure
00358        they match. */
00359     colrow_t numRows = 0, numCols = 0;
00360     int probeCount=0, probeSetCount=0;
00361 
00362     if(cdfFile != "")
00363         EngineUtil::getCdfChipType(chipTypesInLayout, numRows, numCols, probeCount, probeSetCount, cdfFile);
00364     else if(spfFile != "")
00365         EngineUtil::getSpfChipType(chipTypesInLayout, numRows, numCols, probeCount, probeSetCount, spfFile);
00366     else
00367         Err::errAbort("Must specify either a cdf file or spf (simple probe format) file.");
00368 
00369     setOpt("num-rows", ToStr(numRows));
00370     setOpt("num-cols", ToStr(numCols));
00371     setOpt("probe-count", ToStr(probeCount));
00372 
00373     if(chipTypesInLayout.empty() || chipTypesInLayout[0] == "" || probeCount == 0) 
00374         Err::errAbort("Problem determining ChipType in file: " + 
00375               ( cdfFile != "" ? cdfFile : spfFile));
00376 
00377     /* Did the user "force" a set of chip types via options? */
00378     vector<string> chipTypesSupplied = getOptVector("chip-type");
00379 
00380     /* Figure out what chip type to report */
00381     if(chipTypesSupplied.size() > 0) {
00382         setOpt("chip-type", chipTypesSupplied);
00383     } else if(chipTypesInLayout.size() > 0) {
00384         setOpt("chip-type", chipTypesInLayout);
00385     } else {
00386         Err::errAbort("Unable to figure out a chip type.");
00387     }
00388 
00389     /* Do Chip Type Check */
00390     if(!getOptBool("force")) {
00391         vector<string> chipTypeJustPrimary;
00392         vector<string> chipTypesToCheck;
00393 
00394         if(chipTypesSupplied.size() > 0) {
00395             chipTypesToCheck = chipTypesSupplied;
00396             EngineUtil::checkChipTypeVectors(chipTypesSupplied, chipTypesInLayout);
00397         } else {
00398             chipTypesToCheck = chipTypesInLayout;
00399         }
00400 
00401         chipTypeJustPrimary.push_back(chipTypesToCheck[0]);
00402         EngineUtil::checkCelChipTypes(chipTypesToCheck, probeCount, celFiles, numRows, numCols);
00403 
00404         // Check special SNPs files
00405         if (specialSnps != "") {
00406             EngineUtil::checkTsvFileChipType(specialSnps, chipTypeJustPrimary);
00407         }
00408         
00409         // And other files
00410         if (chrXProbes != "") {
00411             EngineUtil::checkTsvFileChipType(chrXProbes, chipTypesToCheck);
00412         }
00413         if (chrYProbes != "") {
00414             EngineUtil::checkTsvFileChipType(chrYProbes, chipTypesToCheck);
00415         }
00416     } // end if(!force)
00417 }
00418 
00419 bool DmetEngine::generateApsProbesetList(string requestedProbesets, string probesetsInRegion, string output, bool allowProbesetConsent) {
00420 
00421     map<string, string> probesetToRegion;
00422     map<string, vector<string> > regionProbesets;
00423     vector<string> probesetsToProcess;
00424 
00425     // Here are the list of probesets in the region
00426     {
00427         affx::TsvFile tsv;
00428         string probeSetName, regionName;
00429         tsv.bind(0,"probeset_id",&probeSetName,affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00430         tsv.bind(0,"region",&regionName,affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00431         if(tsv.open(probesetsInRegion) != affx::TSV_OK)
00432             Err::errAbort("Couldn't open file: '" + probesetsInRegion + "' to read.");
00433         while(tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00434             probesetToRegion[probeSetName] = regionName;
00435             regionProbesets[regionName].push_back(probeSetName);
00436         }
00437     }
00438 
00439     // Here are the list of things requested
00440     if(requestedProbesets != "") {
00441         affx::TsvFile tsv;
00442         string probeSetName;
00443         tsv.bind(0,"probeset_id",&probeSetName,affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00444         if(tsv.open(requestedProbesets) != affx::TSV_OK)
00445             Err::errAbort("Couldn't open file: '" + requestedProbesets + "' to read.");
00446         while(tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00447             if(regionProbesets.find(probeSetName) != regionProbesets.end()) {
00448                 Verbose::out(1,"Adding CN region " + probeSetName + " to the list of regions to process.");
00449                 for(size_t i=0; i<regionProbesets[probeSetName].size(); i++) {
00450                     probesetsToProcess.push_back(regionProbesets[probeSetName][i]);
00451                 }
00452             } else if(allowProbesetConsent) {
00453                 Verbose::out(3,"Adding individual probeset " + probeSetName + " to list to process for CN.");
00454                 if(probesetToRegion.find(probeSetName) != probesetToRegion.end())
00455                     probesetsToProcess.push_back(probeSetName);
00456             }
00457         }
00458     } else {
00459         // Assume everything is consented
00460         Verbose::out(1,"Adding all CN probesets to list to process for CN.");
00461         map<string,string>::iterator iter;
00462         for(iter=probesetToRegion.begin(); iter != probesetToRegion.end(); iter++)
00463             probesetsToProcess.push_back(iter->first);
00464     }
00465 
00466     if(probesetsToProcess.size() < 1) {
00467         return false;
00468     } else {
00469         writeProbesetList(output, probesetsToProcess);
00470         return true;
00471     }
00472 }
00473 
00474 /// @todo: put this in TsvFile::Util.
00475 void DmetEngine::writeProbesetList(string filename, vector<string> &probesets) {
00476     affx::TsvFile out;
00477     out.addHeader("dmet-probeset-list","1");
00478     out.defineColumn(0, 0, "probeset_id");
00479     //
00480     if (out.writeTsv_v1(filename)!=affx::TSV_OK) {
00481       Err::errAbort("cant open file.");
00482     }
00483     //
00484     for(size_t i=0; i<probesets.size(); i++) {
00485         out.set(0,0,probesets[i]);
00486         out.writeLevel(0);
00487     }
00488     out.close();
00489 }
00490 
00491 /**
00492  * Compute probeset summaries values for using in computing CN state
00493  */
00494 bool DmetEngine::computeCnSummaries() {
00495     ProbesetSummarizeEngine engine;
00496 
00497     vector<string> celFiles = getOptVector("cels");
00498     engine.setOpt("cels",celFiles);
00499     vector<string> chipTypes = getOptVector("chip-type");
00500     if(chipTypes.size() > 0)
00501         engine.setOpt("chip-type",chipTypes);
00502     engine.setOpt("cdf-file",getOpt("cdf-file"));
00503     engine.setOpt("spf-file",getOpt("spf-file"));
00504     ///@todo If we have a reference, set analysis based on what was used to build the reference
00505     if(getOpt("ps-analysis") != "")
00506         engine.setOpt("analysis",getOpt("ps-analysis"));
00507     else
00508         engine.setOpt("analysis",
00509             "quant-norm.sketch=50000,pm-only,plier.optmethod=1.FixFeatureEffect=true,expr.genotype=true");
00510     engine.setOpt("out-dir",Fs::join(getOpt("out-dir"),"aps"));
00511     engine.setOpt("verbose",getOpt("verbose"));
00512     engine.setOpt("force",getOpt("force"));
00513     engine.setOpt("cc-chp-output","false");
00514 
00515     // We only want to process intersection of probesets in consent file
00516     // and those in regions
00517     Fs::ensureWriteableDirPath(getOpt("out-dir", false));
00518 
00519     FsPath probesetFile;
00520     probesetFile.setDirName(getOpt("out-dir"));
00521     probesetFile.setFileNameExt("probesets","txt");
00522     if (!generateApsProbesetList(getOpt("probeset-ids-reported"),
00523                                  getOpt("probeset-model"),
00524                                  probesetFile.asUnixPath())) {
00525       return false;
00526     }
00527 
00528     engine.setOpt("probeset-ids",probesetFile.asUnixPath());
00529     engine.setOpt("temp-dir", getOpt("temp-dir"));
00530     engine.setOpt("use-disk", getOpt("use-disk"));
00531     engine.setOpt("disk-cache", getOpt("disk-cache"));
00532     engine.setOpt("set-analysis-name", getOpt("set-analysis-name"));
00533     engine.setOpt("command-line", getOpt("command-line"));
00534     engine.setOpt("exec-guid", getOpt("exec-guid"));
00535     engine.setOpt("program-name", getOpt("program-name"));
00536     engine.setOpt("program-company", getOpt("program-company"));
00537     engine.setOpt("program-version", getOpt("program-version"));
00538     engine.setOpt("program-cvs-id", getOpt("program-cvs-id"));
00539     engine.setOpt("version-to-report", getOpt("version-to-report"));
00540     engine.setOpt("summaries","false");
00541 
00542     engine.setOpt("a5-global-file",getOpt("reference-output"));
00543     //engine.setOpt("a5-global-file-no-replace","true");
00544     engine.setOpt("a5-group","ProbesetSummarizeEngine");
00545     engine.setOpt("a5-sketch","true");
00546     engine.setOpt("a5-summaries","true");
00547     engine.setOpt("a5-feature-effects","true");
00548     if(getOpt("reference-output") != "") {
00549         engine.setOpt("a5-feature-effects-use-global","true");
00550         engine.setOpt("a5-sketch-use-global","true");
00551     }
00552   
00553     engine.setOpt("a5-global-input-file",getOpt("reference-input"));
00554     engine.setOpt("a5-input-group","ProbesetSummarizeEngine");
00555     if(getOpt("reference-input") != "") {
00556         engine.setOpt("a5-sketch-input-global","true");
00557         engine.setOpt("a5-feature-effects-input-global","true");
00558     }
00559 
00560     if(m_ArgvPosAPS > 0) 
00561         engine.parseArgv(m_argv, m_ArgvPosAPS);
00562     engine.run();
00563 
00564     return true;
00565 }

00567 /**
00568  * Compute the CN state
00569  */
00570 void DmetEngine::computeCnState() {
00571     DmetCopyNumberEngine engine;
00572 
00573     engine.setOpt("out-dir",Fs::join(getOpt("out-dir"),"adc"));
00574     engine.setOpt("force",getOpt("force"));
00575     engine.setOpt("verbose",getOpt("verbose"));
00576     engine.setOpt("set-analysis-name", getOpt("set-analysis-name"));
00577     engine.setOpt("command-line", getOpt("command-line"));
00578     engine.setOpt("exec-guid", getOpt("exec-guid"));
00579     engine.setOpt("program-name", getOpt("program-name"));
00580     engine.setOpt("program-company", getOpt("program-company"));
00581     engine.setOpt("program-version", getOpt("program-version"));
00582     engine.setOpt("program-cvs-id", getOpt("program-cvs-id"));
00583     engine.setOpt("version-to-report", getOpt("version-to-report"));
00584 
00585     engine.setOpt("a5-output", "true");
00586     engine.setOpt("text-output", "true");
00587     engine.setOpt("region-model", getOpt("region-model"));
00588     engine.setOpt("cn-region-gt-probeset-file", getOpt("cn-region-gt-probeset-file"));
00589     engine.setOpt("probeset-model", getOpt("probeset-model"));
00590     engine.setOpt("a5-summaries",
00591                   Fs::join(getOpt("out-dir"), "aps",
00592                                getOpt("set-analysis-name") + ".summary.a5"));
00593 
00594     if(m_ArgvPosCN > 0) 
00595         engine.parseArgv(m_argv, m_ArgvPosCN);
00596     engine.run();
00597 }

00599 string setPra(string analysis, int praThresh) {
00600     ///@todo check that pra-thresh is not already set
00601     return analysis + ".pra-thresh=" + ToStr(praThresh);
00602 }

00604 /**
00605  * Compute genotypes
00606  */
00607 void DmetEngine::computeGenotypes() {
00608     ProbesetGenotypeEngine engine;
00609 
00610     vector<string> celFiles = getOptVector("cels");
00611     engine.setOpt("cels",celFiles);
00612     vector<string> chipTypes = getOptVector("chip-type");
00613     if(chipTypes.size() > 0)
00614         engine.setOpt("chip-type",chipTypes);
00615     engine.setOpt("cdf-file",getOpt("cdf-file"));
00616     engine.setOpt("spf-file",getOpt("spf-file"));
00617     string analysis;
00618     if(getOpt("gt-analysis") != "") {
00619         analysis = getOpt("gt-analysis");
00620     } else {
00621         ///@todo If we have a reference, set analysis and qmethod-spec based on 
00622         ///      what was used to build the reference
00623         if(getOpt("reference-output") != "") {
00624             analysis = "quant-norm.sketch=50000,pm-only,brlmm-p-multi.CM=1.bins=100.mix=1.bic=2.lambda=1.0.HARD=3.SB=0.75.KX=0.3.KH=0.3.KXX=0.1.KAH=-0.1.KHB=-0.1.KYAH=-0.05.KYHB=-0.05.KYAB=-0.1.transform=MVA.AAM=2.8.BBM=-2.8.AAV=0.10.BBV=0.10.ABV=0.10.V=1.AAY=10.7.ABY=11.3.BBY=10.7.copyqc=0.00000.wobble=0.05.MS=0.1.copytype=-1.clustertype=2.CSepPen=0.5.ocean=0.0000001";
00625         } else {
00626             analysis = "quant-norm.sketch=50000,pm-only,brlmm-p-multi.CM=2.bins=100.mix=1.bic=2.lambda=1.0.HARD=3.SB=0.75.KX=0.3.KH=0.3.KXX=0.1.KAH=-0.1.KHB=-0.1.KYAH=-0.05.KYHB=-0.05.KYAB=-0.1.transform=MVA.AAM=2.8.BBM=-2.8.AAV=0.10.BBV=0.10.ABV=0.10.V=1.AAY=10.7.ABY=11.3.BBY=10.7.copyqc=0.00000.wobble=0.05.MS=0.1.copytype=-1.clustertype=2.CSepPen=0.5.ocean=0.0000001";
00627         }
00628         analysis += ".cc-alleles=6";
00629         analysis += ".cc-type=UCHAR";
00630         analysis += ".cc-version=1.0";
00631     }
00632     if(getOpt("gt-qmethod-spec") != "")
00633         engine.setOpt("qmethod-spec",getOpt("gt-qmethod-spec"));
00634     else
00635         engine.setOpt("qmethod-spec","plier.optmethod=1.FixFeatureEffect=true");
00636 
00637     analysis = setPra(analysis,getOptInt("pra-thresh"));
00638     engine.setOpt("analysis",analysis);
00639     engine.setOpt("out-dir",Fs::join(getOpt("out-dir"),"apg"));
00640     engine.setOpt("verbose",getOpt("verbose"));
00641     engine.setOpt("force",getOpt("force"));
00642     engine.setOpt("cc-chp-output","false");
00643     engine.setOpt("probeset-ids-reported",getOpt("probeset-ids-reported"));
00644     engine.setOpt("probeset-ids",getOpt("probeset-ids"));
00645     engine.setOpt("temp-dir", getOpt("temp-dir"));
00646     engine.setOpt("use-disk", getOpt("use-disk"));
00647     engine.setOpt("disk-cache", getOpt("disk-cache"));
00648     engine.setOpt("set-analysis-name", getOpt("set-analysis-name"));
00649     engine.setOpt("call-coder-max-alleles", getOpt("call-coder-max-alleles"));
00650     engine.setOpt("call-coder-type", getOpt("call-coder-type"));
00651     engine.setOpt("call-coder-version", getOpt("call-coder-version"));
00652     engine.setOpt("command-line", getOpt("command-line"));
00653     engine.setOpt("exec-guid", getOpt("exec-guid"));
00654     engine.setOpt("program-name", getOpt("program-name"));
00655     engine.setOpt("program-company", getOpt("program-company"));
00656     engine.setOpt("program-version", getOpt("program-version"));
00657     engine.setOpt("program-cvs-id", getOpt("program-cvs-id"));
00658     engine.setOpt("version-to-report", getOpt("version-to-report"));
00659     engine.setOpt("prior-size", "1");
00660     engine.setOpt("special-snps", getOpt("special-snps"));
00661     engine.setOpt("em-gender", "false");
00662     if(getOpt("chrX-probes") != "") {
00663         engine.setOpt("chrX-probes", getOpt("chrX-probes"));
00664         engine.setOpt("chrY-probes", getOpt("chrY-probes"));
00665         engine.setOpt("set-gender-method", "cn-probe-chrXY-ratio");
00666         engine.setOpt("no-gender-force", "false");
00667     } else {
00668         engine.setOpt("set-gender-method", "none");
00669         engine.setOpt("no-gender-force", "true");
00670     }
00671     engine.setOpt("female-thresh", getOpt("female-thresh"));
00672     engine.setOpt("male-thresh", getOpt("male-thresh"));
00673     engine.setOpt("table-output", "false");
00674     engine.setOpt("output-context", "true");
00675     engine.setOpt("output-forced-calls", "true");
00676 
00677     if (getOptBool("run-cn-engine") && getOpt("cn-region-gt-probeset-file") != "") {
00678       /// @todo perhaps we should use state to track the file name
00679       ///       as it is we need to keep this in sync with the cn engine call
00680       engine.setOpt("genotype-markers-cn-file", 
00681                     Fs::join(getOpt("out-dir"),
00682                                  "adc",
00683                                  getOpt("set-analysis-name") + ".gt.markers.cn.call.a5"));
00684     }
00685 
00686     engine.setOpt("a5-global-file",getOpt("reference-output"));
00687     engine.setOpt("a5-global-file-no-replace","true");
00688     engine.setOpt("a5-group","ProbesetGenotypeEngine");
00689     engine.setOpt("a5-calls","true");
00690     engine.setOpt("a5-summaries","true");
00691     engine.setOpt("a5-feature-effects","true");
00692     engine.setOpt("a5-sketch","true");
00693     engine.setOpt("a5-write-models","true");
00694     if(getOpt("reference-output") != "") {
00695         engine.setOpt("a5-sketch-use-global","true");
00696         engine.setOpt("a5-feature-effects-use-global","true");
00697         engine.setOpt("a5-write-models-use-global","true");
00698     }
00699   
00700     engine.setOpt("a5-global-input-file",getOpt("reference-input"));
00701     engine.setOpt("a5-input-group","ProbesetGenotypeEngine");
00702     if(getOpt("reference-input") != "") {
00703         engine.setOpt("a5-sketch-input-global","true");
00704         engine.setOpt("a5-feature-effects-input-global","true");
00705         engine.setOpt("a5-models-input-global","true");
00706     }
00707 
00708     if(m_ArgvPosAPG > 0) 
00709         engine.parseArgv(m_argv, m_ArgvPosAPG);
00710     engine.run();
00711 }
00712 
00713 string DmetEngine::makeVal(string name, int optionIndex) {
00714     vector<string> vals;
00715     vals = getOptVector(name, optionIndex);
00716 
00717     /*
00718     if(name.find("file") != string::npos)
00719         for(int i=0; i<vals.size(); i++)
00720             vals[i] = Fs::basename(vals[i]);
00721     */
00722     string val;
00723     if(vals.size() > 1) {
00724         val = "'" + vals[0] + "'";
00725         for(int i=1; i<vals.size(); i++) {
00726             val += ",'" + vals[i] + "'";
00727         }
00728     } else if(vals.size() == 1) {
00729         val = vals[0];
00730     } else {
00731         val = getOpt(name,optionIndex);
00732     }
00733     return val;
00734 }
00735 
00736 void DmetEngine::fillInAnalysisInfo(AnalysisInfo &info) {
00737     string prefix = "apt-";
00738 
00739     vector<string> celFiles = getOptVector("cels");
00740     info.m_AlgVersion = "3.0";
00741     info.m_AlgName = getOpt("set-analysis-name");
00742     info.m_ProgramName = getOpt("program-name");
00743     info.m_ProgramVersion = getOpt("version-to-report");
00744     info.m_ProgramCompany = getOpt("program-company");
00745     info.m_ChipType = getOpt("chip-type");
00746     info.m_ProgID = "";
00747     info.m_ExecGuid = getOpt("exec-guid");
00748     info.m_AnalysisGuid = getOpt("analysis-guid");
00749 
00750     // Execution info
00751     info.addParam("apt-engine", "DmetEngine");
00752     info.addParam(prefix + "program-name", getOpt("program-name"));
00753     info.addParam(prefix + "command-line", getOpt("command-line"));
00754     info.addParam(prefix + "exec-guid", getOpt("exec-guid"));
00755     info.addParam(prefix + "analysis-guid", getOpt("analysis-guid"));
00756     info.addParam(prefix + "time-str", getOpt("time-start"));
00757     info.addParam(prefix + "version", getOpt("version-to-report"));
00758     info.addParam(prefix + "cvs-id", getOpt("program-cvs-id"));
00759 
00760     // Engine Options
00761     string opt = "opt-";
00762     vector<string> initialOptionNames;
00763     getOptionNames(initialOptionNames,1);
00764     for(int i=0; i<initialOptionNames.size(); i++) {
00765         string name = initialOptionNames[i];
00766         if((name != "cels") || getOptBool("batch-info")){
00767             info.addParam(prefix + opt + name, makeVal(name,1));
00768         }
00769     }
00770 
00771     // Cel files in batch
00772     if(getOptBool("batch-info")){
00773         for(uint32_t i = 0; i < celFiles.size(); i++) {
00774             std::string paramName = prefix + opt + "cel-" + ToStr(i+1);
00775             info.addParam(paramName, Fs::basename(celFiles[i]));
00776         
00777             affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData cel;
00778             try {
00779                 cel.SetFileName(celFiles[i].c_str());
00780                 if(!cel.ReadHeader()) {
00781                     Err::errAbort("Unable to read CEL file " + celFiles[i]);
00782                 }
00783                 affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData *gdata = cel.GetGenericData();
00784                 if (gdata != NULL)
00785                 {
00786                     std::string paramName = prefix + opt + "cel-guid-" + ToStr(i+1);
00787                     info.addParam(paramName, gdata->Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileId());
00788                 }
00789                 cel.Close();
00790             }
00791             catch (...)
00792             {
00793                 Err::errAbort("Unable to read CEL file " + celFiles[i]);
00794             }
00795         }
00796     }
00797     
00798     // Engine State
00799     string option = "state-";
00800     std::vector<std::string> optionNames;
00801     getOptionNames(optionNames);
00802     for(int i=0; i<optionNames.size(); i++) {
00803         string name = optionNames[i];
00804         if((name != "cels") || getOptBool("batch-info")){
00805             info.addParam(prefix + option + name, makeVal(name));
00806         }
00807     }
00808 
00809     // Sanity check
00810     Err::check(info.m_ParamValues.size() == info.m_ParamNames.size(),
00811              "AnalysisInfo - Names and values out of sync.");
00812 }
00813 
00814 /**
00815  * Build final CHP files
00816  */
00817 void DmetEngine::generateChpFiles() {
00818 
00819   DmetCHPWriter engine;
00820 
00821   AnalysisInfo info;
00822   fillInAnalysisInfo(info);
00823   engine.setAnalysisInfo(info);
00824 
00825   vector<string> celFiles = getOptVector("cels");
00826   engine.setOpt("cels",celFiles);
00827   engine.setOpt("out-dir",Fs::join(getOpt("out-dir"),"chp"));
00828   engine.setOpt("verbose",getOpt("verbose"));
00829   engine.setOpt("set-analysis-name", getOpt("set-analysis-name"));
00830   engine.setOpt("exec-guid", getOpt("exec-guid"));
00831   engine.setOpt("program-name", getOpt("program-name"));
00832   engine.setOpt("program-company", getOpt("program-company"));
00833   engine.setOpt("program-version", getOpt("program-version"));
00834   engine.setOpt("batch-name", getOpt("batch-name"));
00835 
00836   if (getOptBool("run-cn-engine")) {
00837     engine.setOpt("a5-copynumber",
00838                   Fs::join(getOpt("out-dir"), "adc",
00839                                getOpt("set-analysis-name") + ".copynumber.a5"));
00840   }
00841 
00842   engine.setOpt("a5-summaries",
00843                 Fs::join(getOpt("out-dir"), "apg",
00844                              getOpt("set-analysis-name") + ".summary.a5"));
00845   engine.setOpt("a5-calls", 
00846                 Fs::join(getOpt("out-dir"), "apg",
00847                              getOpt("set-analysis-name") + ".calls.a5"));
00848   engine.setOpt("a5-forced-calls", 
00849                 Fs::join(getOpt("out-dir"), "apg", getOpt("set-analysis-name") + ".forced-calls.a5"));
00850   engine.setOpt("a5-confidences", 
00851                 Fs::join(getOpt("out-dir"), "apg",
00852                              getOpt("set-analysis-name") + ".confidences.a5"));
00853   engine.setOpt("a5-context", 
00854                 Fs::join(getOpt("out-dir"), "apg",
00855                              getOpt("set-analysis-name") + ".context.a5"));
00856   engine.setOpt("report-file", 
00857                 Fs::join(getOpt("out-dir"), "apg",
00858                              getOpt("set-analysis-name") + ".report.txt"));
00859 
00860   engine.setOpt("spf-file",getOpt("spf-file"));
00861   engine.setOpt("cdf-file",getOpt("cdf-file"));
00862   engine.setOpt("region-model", getOpt("region-model"));
00863   engine.setOpt("null-context", getOpt("null-context"));
00864   engine.setOpt("geno-call-thresh", getOpt("geno-call-thresh"));
00865   engine.setOpt("call-coder-max-alleles", getOpt("call-coder-max-alleles"));
00866   engine.setOpt("call-coder-type", getOpt("call-coder-type"));
00867   engine.setOpt("call-coder-version", getOpt("call-coder-version"));
00868 
00869   engine.run();
00870 }
00871 
00872 /**
00873  * compute CHP files
00874  */
00875 void DmetEngine::runImp() {
00876 
00877     setOpt("analysis-guid", affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid());
00878 
00879     string errMsg;
00880 
00881     if(!Fs::isWriteableDir(getOpt("out-dir")))
00882         if(Fs::mkdirPath(getOpt("out-dir"), false) != APT_OK)
00883             Err::errAbort("Can't make or write to directory: " + getOpt("out-dir"));
00884     if(getOptBool("run-cn-engine")) {
00885         Verbose::out(1,"");
00886         Verbose::out(1,"Step 1: Computing probeset summaries for copy number state calling");
00887         if(computeCnSummaries()) {
00888             Verbose::out(1,"");
00889             Verbose::out(1,"Step 2: Computing copy number states");
00890             computeCnState();
00891             setOpt("run-cn-engine","true");
00892         } else {
00893             Verbose::out(1,"");
00894             Verbose::out(1,"No CN regions to compute. Skipping step 2.");
00895             setOpt("run-cn-engine","false");
00896         }
00897     } else {
00898         Verbose::out(1,"");
00899         Verbose::out(1,"Not computing CN state. Skipping steps 1 and 2.");
00900         setOpt("run-cn-engine","false");
00901     }
00902     Verbose::out(1,"");
00903     Verbose::out(1,"Step 3: Computing genotypes");
00904     computeGenotypes();
00905     if(getOptBool("cc-chp-output")) {
00906         Verbose::out(1,"");
00907         Verbose::out(1,"Step 4: Generating CHP files");
00908         generateChpFiles();
00909     }
00910     Verbose::out(1,"");
00911     Verbose::out(1, "Done.");
00912 }
